thread.title: BRIEF-Yuzhou Properties Co Announces Acquisition Of Century East

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yuzhou Properties Co Announces Acquisition Of Century East

organizations.name: brief-yuzhou properties co announces acquisition of century east

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Yuzhou Properties Co Ltd:
* ANNOUNCES TRANSACTION IN RELATION TO ACQUISITION OF ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL IN CENTURY EAST
* DEAL FOR RMB3.80 BILLION * ‍APPLICATION MADE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN SHARES FROM 16 JAN 2018​
* UNIT TO ACQUIRE CENTURY EAST FROM COASTAL GREENLAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
